item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 24, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Adversarial Policies Beat Superhuman Go AIs (32 points | 8 comments)

8. Build a Low-Cost Drone Using ESP32 (250 points | 77 comments)
9. Why are cancer guidelines stuck in PDFs? (197 points | 84 comments)
10. Automating the search for artificial life with foundation models (113 points | 12 comments)
11. National Cryptologic Museum (NSA/CSS) New Temporary Exhibit on Project Stargate (43 points | 12 comments)
12. Demystifying Debuggers, Part 2: The Anatomy of a Running Program (119 points | 12 comments)

14. Tokyo released point cloud data of the entire city for free (70 points | 2 comments)
15. Threads of God (33 points | 35 comments)

25. Xerox to acquire Lexmark (233 points | 202 comments)

27. AI Decodes the Calls of the Wild (75 points | 26 comments)

29. Happy 400th birthday to the world’s oldest bond (304 points | 129 comments)
30. More men are addicted to the 'crack cocaine' of the stock market (72 points | 125 comments)
